alert.note: Alert for Guernsey; Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:14AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN GUERNSEY...NORTHEASTERN MUSKINGUM AND NORTHWESTERN NOBLE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 214 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Concord, or 11 miles west of Cambridge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, New Concord, Byesville, Senecaville, Pleasant City, Cumberland, Lore City, Salesville, and Norwich. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 164 and 185. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 35 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
